_header: Wilt thou and I by one assent
Subjects: lovers, addresses to beloved; lover’s plea
_description: A lover’s plea to his lady — one stanza rhyme royal

CamTCC1450.First Lines:
Wylt thow & I by one assentThow thie selfe shalt chuse or
                    no…
CamTCC1450.Last Lines:
…Iape on who lyst for earnyst I meaneThe yea geavythe lyfe the
                    nay byllithe playn
CamTCC1450.Note: Added by a hand of sixteenth century.
